summary: Elizabeth J. Palmer was an employee of the Select Committee on Assassinations (SCAS). She is listed in payroll and certification reports from April 1978 to December 1978. These documents provide her name, and potentially her salary, although the specific salary figures are not consistently extracted in the summaries provided. The documents indicate her employment with the SCAS during the period of its investigation.
significance: Elizabeth J. Palmer's significance lies in her employment with the Select Committee on Assassinations, indicating her involvement in the investigation, although the specific nature and extent of her role are not detailed in the provided document summaries.
